title: The 9 best beauty products to buy now, according to The Telegraph's experts
text:
Fancy investing in a few new beauty products but don't know where to start? Fear not. Each week we will be rounding up the best beauty products that we've tried, tested and loved.

Compiled by our Stella editor, Marianne Jones, acting beauty director, Annabel Jones and digital beauty assistant, Camilla Hooper, there is always something for everyone to choose from.

From Urban Decay's Naked Honey Eyeshadow Palette, to Sisley's Velvet Sleeping Mask with Saffron Flowers, these are the beauty buys that have caught our eye this week...
description: Fancy investing in a few new beauty products but don't know where to start?
